card.name: Etrata, the Silencer
card.property: Etrata can't be blocked. Whenever Etrata deals combat damage to a player, exile target creature that player controls and put a hit counter on that card. That player loses the game if they own three or more exiled cards with hit counters on them. Etrata's owner shuffles Etrata into their library.

card.name: Stolen Identity
card.property: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Syncopate
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Telling Time
card.property: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of those cards into your hand, one on top of your library, and one on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Last Gasp
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Netherborn Phalanx
card.property: When this creature enters, each opponent loses 1 life for each creature they control. Transmute {1}{B}{B} ({1}{B}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ribbons of Night
card.property: Ribbons of Night deals 4 damage to target creature and you gain 4 life. If {U} was spent to cast this spell, draw a card.

card.name: Call of the Nightwing
card.property: Create a 1/1 blue and black Horror creature token with flying. Cipher (Then you may exile this spell card encoded on a creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player, its controller may cast a copy of the encoded card without paying its mana cost.)

card.name: Circu, Dimir Lobotomist
card.property: Whenever you cast a blue spell, exile the top card of target player's library. Whenever you cast a black spell, exile the top card of target player's library. Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as a card exiled with Circu.

card.name: Consuming Aberration
card.property: Consuming Aberration's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your opponents' graveyards. Whenever you cast a spell, each opponent reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a land card, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

card.name: Dimir Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target sorcery spell. • Destroy target creature with power 2 or less. • Look at the top three cards of target player's library. Put one back and the rest into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Dimir Doppelganger
Dimir Guildmage
card.property: ({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.) {3}{U}: Target player draws a card. Activate only as a sorcery. {3}{B}: Target player discards a card. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Dinrova Horror
card.property: When this creature enters, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.

card.name: Glimpse the Unthinkable
card.property: Target player mills ten cards.

card.name: Lazav, Dimir Mastermind
card.property: Hexproof Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you may have Lazav become a copy of that card, except its name is Lazav, Dimir Mastermind, it's legendary in addition to its other types, and it has hexproof and this ability.

card.name: Mirko Vosk, Mind Drinker
card.property: Flying Whenever Mirko Vosk deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal four land cards, then puts those cards into their graveyard.

card.name: Moroii
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

card.name: Nightveil Specter
card.property: Flying Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles the top card of their library. You may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled with this creature.

card.name: Szadek, Lord of Secrets
card.property: Flying If Szadek would deal combat damage to a player, instead put that many +1/+1 counters on Szadek and that player mills that many cards.

card.name: Warped Physique
card.property: Target creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Dimir Aqueduct
card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{B}.

card.name: Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind
card.property: Flying Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet deals 1 damage to any target. {T}: Draw a card.

card.name: Thunderheads
card.property: Replicate {2}{U} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost.) Create a 3/3 blue Weird creature token with defender and flying. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Char
card.property: Char deals 4 damage to any target and 2 damage to you.

card.name: Electrickery
card.property: Electrickery deals 1 damage to target creature you don't control. Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

card.name: Goblin Rally
card.property: Create four 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

card.name: Guttersnipe
card.property: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, this creature deals 2 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Mizzium Mortars
card.property: Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to target creature you don't control. Overload {3}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change "target" in its text to "each.")

card.name: Pyromatics
card.property: Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Pyromatics deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Shattering Spree
card.property: Replicate {R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.) Destroy target artifact.

card.name: Cerebral Vortex
card.property: Target player draws two cards, then Cerebral Vortex deals damage to that player equal to the number of cards they've drawn this turn.

card.name: Djinn Illuminatus
card.property: ({U/R} can be paid with either {U} or {R}.) Flying Each instant and sorcery spell you cast has replicate. The replicate cost is equal to its mana cost. (When you cast it, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

card.name: Electrolyze
card.property: Electrolyze deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets. Draw a card.

card.name: Gelectrode
card.property: {T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may untap this creature.

card.name: Hypersonic Dragon
card.property: Flying, haste You may cast sorcery spells as though they had flash. (You may cast them any time you could cast an instant.)

card.name: Invoke the Firemind
card.property: Choose one — • Draw X cards. • Invoke the Firemind deals X damage to any target.

card.name: Izzet Charm
card.property: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}. • Izzet Charm deals 2 damage to target creature. • Draw two cards, then discard two cards.

card.name: Nivix Guildmage
Stitch in Time
card.property: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Tibor and Lumia
card.property: Whenever you cast a blue spell, target creature gains flying until end of turn. Whenever you cast a red spell, Tibor and Lumia deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Turn // Burn
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a red Weird with base power and toughness 0/1. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.) // Burn deals 2 damage to any target. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

alternate.name: Turn
alternate.property: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a red Weird with base power and toughness 0/1. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

alternate.name: Burn
alternate.property: Burn deals 2 damage to any target. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

alternate.name: Turn and Burn
alternate.property: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a red Weird with base power and toughness 0/1. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.) Burn deals 2 damage to any target. Fuse (You may cast one or both halves of this card from your hand.)

card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {U}{R}.

card.name: Izoni, Thousand-Eyed
card.property: Undergrowth — When Izoni enters, create a 1/1 black and green Insect creature token for each creature card in your graveyard. {B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain 1 life and draw a card.

card.name: Darkblast
card.property: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Slum Reaper
card.property: When this creature enters, each player sacrifices a creature of their choice.

card.name: Stinkweed Imp
card.property: Flying Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. Dredge 5 (If you would draw a card, you may mill five cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Vigor Mortis
card.property: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If {G} was spent to cast this spell, that creature enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Deadbridge Goliath
card.property: Scavenge {4}{G}{G} ({4}{G}{G}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Put a number of +1/+1 counters equal to this card's power on target creature. Scavenge only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Elves of Deep Shadow
card.property: {T}: Add {B}. This creature deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Abrupt Decay
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Destroy target nonland permanent with mana value 3 or less.

card.name: Deadbridge Chant
card.property: When this enchantment enters, mill ten cards. At the beginning of your upkeep, choose a card at random in your graveyard. If it's a creature card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand.

card.name: Deathrite Shaman
card.property: {T}: Exile target land card from a graveyard. Add one mana of any color. {B}, {T}: Exile target instant or sorcery card from a graveyard. Each opponent loses 2 life. {G}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Drown in Filth
card.property: Choose target creature. Mill four cards, then that creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each land card in your graveyard.

card.name: Gaze of Granite
card.property: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value X or less.

card.name: Golgari Charm
card.property: Choose one — • All creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn. • Destroy target enchantment. • Regenerate each creature you control.

card.name: Grisly Salvage
card.property: Reveal the top five cards of your library. You may put a creature or land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Jarad, Golgari Lich Lord
card.property: Jarad gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your graveyard. {1}{B}{G}, Sacrifice another creature: Each opponent loses life equal to the sacrificed creature's power. Sacrifice a Swamp and a Forest: Return this card from your graveyard to your hand.

Lotleth Troll
card.property: Trample Discard a creature card: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. {B}: Regenerate this creature.

card.name: Putrefy
card.property: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Savra, Queen of the Golgari
card.property: Whenever you sacrifice a black creature, you may pay 2 life. If you do, each other player sacrifices a creature of their choice. Whenever you sacrifice a green creature, you may gain 2 life.

card.name: Shambling Shell
card.property: Sacrifice this creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Dredge 3 (If you would draw a card, you may mill three cards instead. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.)

card.name: Sisters of Stone Death
card.property: {G}: Target creature blocks Sisters of Stone Death this turn if able. {B}{G}: Exile target creature blocking or blocked by Sisters of Stone Death. {2}{B}: Put a creature card exiled with Sisters of Stone Death onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Treasured Find
card.property: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Treasured Find.

card.property: This land enters tapped. When this land enters, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {B}{G}.

card.property: Battalion — Whenever this creature and at least two other creatures attack, this creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.property: Battalion — Whenever this creature and at least two other creatures attack, this creature gains flying until end of turn.

card.property: Double strike
